c74object.name: mvc.newgone
c74object.digest: New and gone elements in a list.
c74object.description: mvc.newgone allows to split incoming list between new elements and gone elements, with respect to previous inputs.

inlet.digest: Incoming element(s) as a list or a symbol

method.name: anything
method.digest: Input values to mvc.newgone (on the left inlet).
method.description: These values will be compared against previous inputs, to see which items are new and which are gone.

method.name: empty
method.description: All currently stored items will be output on the "gone" 1st outlet.

method.name: reset
method.description: The internal list of currently stored items will be resetted, but unlike the empty message, no output will be generated.
